 Get the Right Television for You and Your Family  If you're shopping for a new television, check out the
Television Stuff Guide before you buy. Learn about the different TV types
(including LCD, plasma and DLP), read reviews, compare prices and get answers
to frequently asked questions about digital TV.
Also at HowStuffWorks


How Movie Download Services Work - If you want to buy or rent a
movie, you have a lot of options, including movie rental stores and mail services
like Netflix and Blockbuster Total Access. But if these are too slow for you,
you can download a movie online and begin watching within minutes. Learn more.  

How GPS Phones Work - Imagine driving to a job interview and realizing that you're
lost. What if your cell phone could figure out exactly where you are and give
you turn-by-turn directions to where you're going? Learn
how GPS phones work.
 

How TiVo Works -  In 1997, a company changed the way people watch
 television. TiVo, a brand
of DVR, allows subscribers to record their favorite TV shows and watch them
when they want to. Take a look at how the typical TiVo set works and the
services it provides.
   
This Week's Video 


How HDTV Works - High-definition television (HDTV)
has revolutionized the quality of your TV picture. But for a lot of people,
HDTV hasn't delivered a ready-made source for transcendent experiences in front
of the tube. Instead, people have gone shopping for a TV and found themselves
surrounded by confusing abbreviations and too many choices. Learn how HDTV works
in this video from HowStuffWorks.
